00010 #include "fileextratab.h"
00011 #include "filebuildcommand.h"
00012 
00013 #include <models/component.h>
00014 #include <models/file.h>

00016 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00017 
00018 FileEditor::FileEditor( const QFileInfo& baseLocation, 
00019                                            QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00020                                            void* dataPointer,
00021                                            QWidget *parent ):
00022 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00023 tabs_(this), 
00024 generalTab_(NULL),
00025 extraTab_(NULL),
00026 buildCommand_(NULL),
00027 file_(NULL) {
00028 
00029         file_ = static_cast<File*>(dataPointer);
00030         Q_ASSERT_X(file_, "FileEditor::setDataPointer",
00031                 "static_cast failed to give valid File-pointer");
00032 
00033         QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00034         layout->addWidget(&tabs_);
00035 
00036         generalTab_ = new FileGeneralTab(baseLocation, file_, &tabs_);
00037         tabs_.addTab(generalTab_, tr("General settings"));
00038 
00039         extraTab_ = new FileExtraTab(baseLocation, file_, &tabs_);
00040         tabs_.addTab(extraTab_, tr("External dependencies and defines"));
00041 
00042         buildCommand_ = new FileBuildCommand(&tabs_, file_, baseLocation);
00043         tabs_.addTab(buildCommand_, tr("Build command"));
00044 
00045         // connect the signals informing that widgets have changed their status
00046         connect(generalTab_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00047                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048         connect(generalTab_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00049                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00050         connect(extraTab_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00051                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00052         connect(buildCommand_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00053                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00054 
00055         // fetch the data from the model and disable the discard button
00056         generalTab_->restore();
00057         extraTab_->restore();
00058         buildCommand_->restore();
00059 }
00060 
00061 FileEditor::~FileEditor() {
00062 }
00063 
00064 bool FileEditor::isValid() const {
00065 
00066         // general tab contains the only mandatory fields.
00067         return generalTab_->isValid();
00068 }
00069 
00070 void FileEditor::removeModel() {
00071         file_->remove();
00072         file_ = 0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void FileEditor::makeChanges() {
00076         if (file_) {
00077                 generalTab_->apply();
00078                 extraTab_->apply();
00079                 buildCommand_->apply();
00080         }
00081 }
